name: Allister Hill & the Deceitful Siblings Act 1
name_original: Allister Hill & the Deceitful Siblings Act 1
description: As private investigator, Allister Hill, you've been hired to find out the truth behind the death of a young debutant, but there's more to this case than initially thought. Act 1 is the set-up with more to follow with this text based game.
